simulator.framework

Class SystemTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.framework.AbstractTimer
      • simulator.framework.SystemTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FutureEventListener

    public class SystemTimer
extends AbstractTimer
    This class implements timer functionality for the system queue. Events scheduled on the system queue are not randomized and always occur before events in the simulation queue scheduled at the same time. This timer may not be used in any code written by a student, except when implementing RuntimeMonitors.
